body_html:
If it helps, this is the command used to train the model:
/home/vvkulkarni/bazel/output/bazel run -- //tensorflow/models/rnn/translate:pos --data_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/ --train_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/models_new/ --size=64 --num_layers=2 --steps_per_checkpoint=50 --fr_vocab_size 48 --batch_size 100

and this is the command I used to decode:
/home/vvkulkarni/bazel/output/bazel run -- //tensorflow/models/rnn/translate:pos --data_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/ --train_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/models_new/ --decode 1 --fr_vocab_size 48

body:
If it helps, this is the command used to train the model:
`/home/vvkulkarni/bazel/output/bazel run -- //tensorflow/models/rnn/translate:pos --data_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/ --train_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/models_new/ --size=64 --num_layers=2 --steps_per_checkpoint=50 --fr_vocab_size 48 --batch_size 100`

and this is the command I used to decode:
`/home/vvkulkarni/bazel/output/bazel run -- //tensorflow/models/rnn/translate:pos --data_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/ --train_dir /data/vivek/pos_tags/models_new/ --decode 1 --fr_vocab_size 48`
